name: Effaclar Duo
description: An acne treatment that helps reduce active breakouts and congestion, ideal for oily and acne-prone skin.

name: Adapalene Gel 0.1%
description: A retinoid treatment that helps prevent clogged pores over time, ideal for acne-prone skin when introduced gradually.

name: Azelaic Acid Suspension 10%
description: A treatment that helps improve uneven tone and redness, ideal for sensitive and combination skin.

name: Retinol 0.2% in Squalane
description: A beginner retinol that targets texture and early signs of aging, ideal for normal to dry skin used at night.

name: Discoloration Correcting Serum
description: A treatment serum that helps fade the look of dark spots, ideal for normal to oily skin.

name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Serum
description: A calming treatment that helps reduce visible redness, ideal for sensitive skin.

name: AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution
description: A strong exfoliating peel for occasional use, ideal for oily and combination skin (avoid if sensitive).

name: Blemish + Age Defense
description: An exfoliating treatment that targets breakouts and texture, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Resurfacing Retinol Serum
description: A retinol treatment that supports smoother-looking skin and post-acne marks, ideal for combination and oily skin.

name: Benzoyl Peroxide Gel
description: A spot treatment that helps reduce acne bacteria, ideal for oily and acne-prone skin.

name: Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid
description: A leave-on exfoliant that helps clear pores and blackheads, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Glycolic 10 Renew Overnight
description: An overnight glycolic treatment that helps smooth texture, ideal for normal and combination skin.

name: Cicaplast Baume B5
description: A barrier-repair balm that helps soothe irritation, ideal for sensitive and dry skin.

name: Acne Pimple Master Patch
description: Hydrocolloid patches that protect and help flatten pimples, ideal for acne-prone skin.

name: Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Oil
description: A retinol treatment oil that targets fine lines, ideal for normal to dry skin used at night.
